content: A mixture containing Zn(NO3)2 · 6H2O (0.20 mmol), p-1,4-benzenedicarboxylic acid (H2BDC) (0.20 mmol), phenanthrene-9,10-dione (pheno) (0.10 mmol) and NaOH (0.20 mmol) in water (10 mL) was sealed in a 18 mL Teflon lined stainless steel container and heated at 150 °C for 72 h. The reaction product was dark yellow block crystals of 1, which were washed by deionized water several times and collected by filtration; Yield, 78%. Elemental Analysis: Calcd. for C24H15N2O10Zn2: C, 46.33; H, 2.43; N, 4.50%. Found: C, 46.38; H, 2.47; N, 4.48%. IR (KBr pellet), cm−1 (intensity): 3437 (br), 3062 (m), 1587 (s), 1523 (m), 1491 (w), 1424 (m), 1391 (s), 1226 (w), 1147 (w), 1103 (w), 1051 (w), 875 (w), 843 (m), 740 (w), 728 (m), 657 (w).
clean_text:
Preparation of Zn2(OH)(pheno)(p-BDC)1.5 ⋅ H2O (1)

A mixture containing Zn(NO3)2 ⋅ 6H2O (0.20 mmol), p-1,4-benzenedicarboxylic acid (H2BDC) (0.20 mmol), phenanthrene-9,10-dione (pheno) (0.10 mmol) and NaOH (0.20 mmol) in water (10 mL) was sealed in a 18 mL Teflon lined stainless steel container and heated at 150 °C for 72 h. The reaction product was dark yellow block crystals of 1, which were washed by deionized water several times and collected by filtration; Yield, 78%. Elemental Analysis: Calcd. for C24H15N2O10Zn2: C, 46.33; H, 2.43; N, 4.50%. Found: C, 46.38; H, 2.47; N, 4.48%. IR (KBr pellet), cm-1 (intensity): 3437 (br), 3062 (m), 1587 (s), 1523 (m), 1491 (w), 1424 (m), 1391 (s), 1226 (w), 1147 (w), 1103 (w), 1051 (w), 875 (w), 843 (m), 740 (w), 728 (m), 657 (w).
